Package it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.event.viewcontroller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FinalFrenzyToggleEvent
    Event fired when the master player toggles Final Frenzy.
    MapSelectionEvent
    Event fired when the master player chooses a map.
    PlayerActionSelectionEvent
    Event fired when a player chooses his turn action.
    PlayerCollectAmmoEvent
    Event fired when a player fetches an ammo card from a square.
    PlayerCollectWeaponEvent
    Event fired when a player fetches a weapon from a spawnpoint.
    PlayerColorSelectionEvent
    Event fired when a player changes his color.
    PlayerDiscardPowerUpEvent
    Event fired a player discards a powerup for (re)spawning.
    PlayerPaymentEvent
    Event fired when a player completes a payment.
    PlayerPowerUpEvent
    Event fired when a player uses a powerup.
    PlayerReloadEvent
    Event fired when a player reloads a weapon.
    PlayerSelectWeaponEffectEvent
    Event fired when a player selects an effect of a weapon.
    PlayerSelectWeaponEvent
    Event fired when a player selects a weapon for shooting.
    PlayerSetColorEvent
    Event fired when a player's color is set.
    PlayerSwapWeaponEvent
    Event fired when a player swaps his weapons for another one.
    PlayerUnsuspendEvent
    Event fired when a player unsuspends himself.
    SelectDirectionEvent
    Event fired when a player chooses a direction.
    SelectPlayerEvent
    Event fired when a player selects another player as a target during a shooting.
    SelectSquareEvent
    Event fired when a player selects a square as a target during a shooting.
    SkipSelectionEvent
    Event fired when a player skips the selection of a target during an attack.
    SpawnPointDamageEvent
    Event fired when a player damages a spawn point.
    SquareMoveSelectionEvent
    Event fired when a player selects a square as destination for his movement.
